title: bug splat every game
body:
this is happening every game and I 1 want to play and 2 dont want any bans or reorts
the link that i am given when i send an error report goes to a page that does not exist 

Crash Report #125325510
Thank you for reporting your crash with BugSplat! Crash reports help us to identify new issues, and fix them more effectively.

Please check the League of Legends Tech Support page for possible solutions:
http://support.leagueoflegends.com/forums/210177-tech-support



update Ive also been put in low priority que now and I am never a toxic player

replies.body:
>a page that does not exist 

People have been experiencing connection issues in regards to connect to the support page and, coincidentally, the ability to download the game. What happens if you click on that link you posted?
it takes me to the amumu thing where it says it may have been moved or mistyped but that really isnt the problem here

Oh, that's just outdated links. I was thinking you couldn't connect to riotgames.com, which would have meant you have the problem many others have.

What OS are you on?
